name: Fetch_Post_Data_Workflow
description: Workflow to fetch post data from a specified API endpoint.

transitions.name: fetch_data
transitions.end_state_description: Data has been fetched from the API

externalized_processors.description: Process to fetch data from the API endpoint.

transitions.name: process_fetched_data

externalized_processors.name: process_process_fetched_data
externalized_processors.description: Process to handle the fetched data.
